person.persName: John Addison Hopson (Caldwell co., ky, farmer )

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. North Carolina native. Married to Permelia A. Mitchusson Hopson in Caldwell County, Kentucky, on March 31, 1834. Married to Emmeline Thomas Dunning Hopson in Trigg County, Kentucky, on March 12, 1851. Father of Thomas Hopson, Emily Hopson, Permelia Hopson, Addison Hopson, William Hopson, and Martha Hopson. Stepfather of Miles Dunning. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmer in Long Pond in 1860. Owned nine enslaved persons in Long Pond in 1860.
